ModMetaData.name: Not a Weapon
ModMetaData.description:
Removes all those "ineffective" weapons that seem to find their way into your pawns arsenal.
This mod removes the Wood Log and Beer from being equipable in the base game as well as containing patches for the following mods: Vanilla Brewing Expanded: All Alcohols and other drinks Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval: Wine Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates: Rum Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings: Mead Grains and Brewing: All Alcohols Vanilla Fishing Expanded: All Fish Vanilla Animals Expanded - Endangered: Fish Alpha Biomes: All Fish and Logs ReGrowth Core and Framework: Fish VGP Vegetable Garden: Iron Wood and Bamboo VGP Bamboo (Standalone): Bamboo Extended Woodworking (Additional Support for VGP XtraTreesandFlowers): All Logs RimCuisine 2: Bottling and Booze Expansiion (Continued): All Alcohols and other drinks Rim of Madness - Bones: Bones Morrowrim Alcohol Remade: All Alcohols Expanded Woodworking: All Logs
Please load after any of the mods listed above if you have them.
Please let me know if there are any other mods you would like to see me add or if there are any issues.
Thanks! -Lt oddy
ModMetaData.author: Lt oddy
